name: Block Jumper (Suhri)
description:
This is a small Platformer game with a few different Levels that you will need to beat with only Jumping. 

When you click with your Mouse the Cube will Jump/Slide in that direction. 
The further away you click the further the Cube will Jump/Slide.

The Game could have a few bugs but I hope you will enjoy it.

-20 Levels

- No Sound/Music
